Apache Taverna Server 3.1.0-incubating-SNAPSHOT API

Packages 
Package Description
org.apache.taverna.server.client
Implementation of a basic client for Taverna Server.
org.apache.taverna.server.client.generic  
org.apache.taverna.server.client.port  
org.apache.taverna.server.client.rest  
org.apache.taverna.server.client.wadl  
org.apache.taverna.server.usagerecord
Open Grid Forum GFD.98 Usage Record Format
org.apache.taverna.server.usagerecord.xml.dsig  
org.apache.taverna.server.usagerecord.xml.urf
Open Grid Forum GFD.98 Usage Record Format JAXB elements.
org.apache.taverna.server.usagerecord.xml.urf2
Open Grid Forum GFD.204 Usage Record Format JAXB elements.
org.taverna.server.localworker.api  
org.taverna.server.localworker.impl  
org.taverna.server.localworker.impl.utils  
org.taverna.server.localworker.remote
Interfaces exported by worker classes to the server.
org.taverna.server.localworker.server
Interfaces exported by the server to worker classes.
org.taverna.server.master
The core of the implementation of Taverna Server, including the implementations of the SOAP and REST interfaces.
org.taverna.server.master.admin
This package contains the RESTful administration interface to Taverna Server.
org.taverna.server.master.api
API interfaces for the main service classes.
org.taverna.server.master.common
This package contains the common XML elements used throughout Taverna Server's various interfaces.
org.taverna.server.master.common.version  
org.taverna.server.master.defaults
This package contains information about the various default values supported by the server.
org.taverna.server.master.exceptions
This package contains the exceptions/faults thrown by Taverna Server.
org.taverna.server.master.facade
Simple facade used at the top level of the Taverna Server in order to provide an entry splash page.
org.taverna.server.master.factories
These interfaces define the principal way for the factories of worker classes to be invoked.
org.taverna.server.master.identity
Implementations of beans that map global user identities to local usernames.
org.taverna.server.master.interaction
This package contains the Atom feed implementation for interactions for a particular workflow run.
org.taverna.server.master.interfaces
Interfaces to the main worker classes that provide the magical power that drives the webapp front-end.
org.taverna.server.master.localworker
Implementation of a Taverna Server back-end that works by forking off workflow executors on the local system.
org.taverna.server.master.notification
The notification fabric and implementations of notification dispatchers that support subscription.
org.taverna.server.master.notification.atom
This package contains the Atom feed implementation within Taverna Server.
org.taverna.server.master.rest
This package contains the RESTful interface to Taverna Server.
org.taverna.server.master.rest.handler
This package contains type handlers for the RESTful interface to Taverna Server.
org.taverna.server.master.soap
This package contains the SOAP interface to Taverna Server.
org.taverna.server.master.usage
Resource usage recording mechanism.
org.taverna.server.master.utils
Miscellaneous utility classes.
org.taverna.server.master.worker
A Taverna Server back-end that works by forking off workflow executors.
org.taverna.server.port_description  
org.taverna.server.port_description.utils  
org.taverna.server.rmidaemon
RMI daemon implementation.
org.taverna.server.unixforker
